H0.text: who had the best strike rate among batsmen who scored over 200 runs in the world cup. AB de Villiers

H1.text: who had the best strike rate among batsmen who scored over 200 runs in the world cup. Glenn Maxwell

H2.text: who had the best strike rate among batsmen who scored over 200 runs in the world cup. Jos Buttler

H3.text: who had the best strike rate among batsmen who scored over 200 runs in the world cup. Chris Gayle

A4.text: His strike rate of 136.73 is the highest among South African batsmen who have scored centuries in World Cup matches.

A5.text: He scored two successive centuries in the 2011 World Cup.
